name: Kraton Corporation
description: Kraton Corporation is a global leader in sustainable specialty polymers and high-performance materials. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Kraton focuses on transforming renewable resources into high-value products that enhance performance and sustainability. The company specializes in styrenic block copolymers, which are used in a diverse range of applications including adhesives, sealants, coatings, and personal care products. Kraton's innovative approach combines advanced technology with a commitment to sustainability, enabling them to offer products that not only meet the demands of various industries but also contribute positively to the environment. Their product portfolio includes Kraton G® and Kraton D® polymers, which are recognized for their versatility and superior performance. Kraton is dedicated to reducing its carbon footprint and has implemented several initiatives aimed at sustainable sourcing and manufacturing practices. The company actively engages in research and development to drive innovation and remains committed to delivering value to its customers while maintaining a strong focus on corporate responsibility and environmental stewardship. With a global reach and a robust network of operations, Kraton is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of its customers in an increasingly competitive landscape.
